scripts.start: npm run helm-package-and-index && npm run mkdocs-serve
scripts.helm-repo-index: helm repo index --url https://alexdresko.github.io/helm-charts/ --merge index.yaml . && cp index.yaml pages/_data/index.yaml && cp index.yaml pages/docs/index.yaml && cp *.tgz ./pages/docs/ -v
scripts.helm-package-and-index: npm run helm-package && npm run helm-repo-index
scripts.helm-install: npm run helm-dependency-update && npm run basic-helm-install && npm run advanced-helm-install
scripts.helm-delete: helm delete basic && helm delete advanced
scripts.helm-reinstall: npm run helm-delete & npm run helm-dependency-update && npm run helm-install
